metadata.title: CVE-2024-25581 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When incoming DNS over HTTPS support is enabled using the nghttp2 provider,and queries are routed to a tcp-only or DNS over TLS backend, an attackercan trigger an assertion failure in DNSdist by sending a request for a zonetransfer (AXFR or IXFR) over DNS over HTTPS, causing the process to stopand thus leading to a Denial of Service. DNS over HTTPS is not enabled bydefault, and backends are using plain DNS (Do53) by default.

criterions.comment: dnsdist package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
